answers.answer: im sorry....im not fond of ERs anymore since my whole ordeal...keep your chin up and call your doc today...hopefully he'll get you in before the weekend

That's the thing after my Dr was done delivering they called and talked to him.....(he was in the same building remember) and his responce to them was ok you can just treat her.....he was in the same building....I feel like something is wrong like they are missing something.....and nobody will listen....I'm so mad.

I would be mad too! When i went to the ER with cramps 9 days after losing my baby they didn't call my OB/GYN and when i saw him a few days later (he admited me) he was MAD. so the next week when i was going to the er for my 3rd iv every night I saw they called him in 2/5 nights...they must've had a talking to.
The ER was very nice just slow I'm actually mad at my DR....he could have came over and took charge but he didn't
I'd call your OB office this morning and demand to be seen......That's bologna....especially being he was in the SAME building anyway......
he's not in on Friday's he's in surgery all day
AHHHHH!  Are there other Dr.'s in the office that you go to?  I'd be TICKED OFF!  Are you feeling OK today???

I'm very ticked I keep telling them I don't think everything is ok....and even the nurse at the clinic listened and so far the only one on my side....she totally thinks I need the urine test to make sure all is ok....and then I could at least breath...and calm  my nerves alot more....my friend works for another OB on town I totally don't like him but with her on my side maybe I could at least get some answers......there are no other Dr's at my regular OB's office.....and the thing is I've never had problems with him only good words and now I'm so mad at him....

Those skips that you feel sometimes can`t be detected on ECG because the track is short (max 1 minute) and the extrasystoles can`t be catched. I think you should wear that heart monitor. That`s more imortant. The urine wan`t tell you nothing. You can do urine test another day.The result from heart monitor will tell how often you have those skips and do you need therapy or not.You will talk to your doctor about this and about therapy. Don`t worry.
I'm worried about the urine test because I have all the symptoms of preeclampsia and no body will listen.....but I'm wearing the heart monitor.

I`m sorry I though it`s just the heart rate. Then you will make an appt at your doctor to check you about preeclampsia. I hope you will be fine. Check your BP at home and take more rest during the weekend.

I called them yesterday with my concerns and they sent me to the ER I told them i had all they signs of preeclampsia without the high BP  and they didn't test me for it either....I feel like no one will listen but my gut tells me something is wrong.

Do you have swellings? How long you will wear that monitor. I think 24 h. When you go back to them to get off the monitor insist one more time for urine test. Or maybe you can bye sticks in pharmacy wich can detect proteins in urine. I don`t how to help you. I`m really sorry. But preeclampsia is more often during the third trimester. Magnesium Tablets are indicated in this case.

I have had to quit wearing my rings the past 2 weeks also.....I wonder if you can buy tests at the pharmacy...I know it's not normal in the second trimester in singleton births but in multiples it's more common....yeah I have to take the heart monitor back tonight to the ER

I don't understand why the er didn't give you a urine test...you're pregnant..having issues...i'd think that would be the first thing they would do (although my dr didn't and she put me off for my BP...but I have no faith in her and will never ever go back to her)...but the er did one on me even when i went in with a panic attack a week after i lost mine

I'm sorry for your ordeal. It really sucks when you're not seen by the one person that knows what's going on with your body "almost" as well as you do.This was my experience with my son 2 1/2 yrs ago. I was having contractions at 7 mos and was sent to labor and delivery. The hospital called my Dr office and he was on his way to the hospital for a delivery. When the nurse in labor/delivery told me that, I thought my Dr would come by and check on me. No, he never did. Contractions stoped and I was sent home and was to follow up with my Dr. Where I found out Fibronectin (I think that's how you spell it) was found in my CM which is a sign of pre-term labor. I asked my Dr why he was not able to stop in to check on me. He told me that he is only contracted through the hospital for labor/delivery. If I am NOT in active labor, they will not admit me and therefore have to be seen by their staff. He did however call the hospital and kept track of my progress. Which thank goodness I didn't progress any further.So, maybe talk to your Dr. He may be in the same situation as mine. Which makes perfect since. That's why you pre-register at the hospital. It's almost like reserving a hotel room. Where as if you walk in off the street, you would deliver your baby with a Dr on staff.
ok I called around and I can get the glocous protien urine tests at Walgreens fro $14.99 for a Kit of 50...now I just have to wait 4 more hours to get off work.....

question: Ok so I wemt to the clinic like my Dr's nurse told me for a manual BP check and strangely enough my BP was fine....but she said my pule was way out of whack....she kept telling me my heart would skip beats and totally quit for a bit.....so I should call my OB and let them know....so I did and the nurse went on to tell me my Dr was about to leave for a delivery so I should go to the ER and they would send me to Labor and delivery where he was......did that happen?  No....I was in the ER for 2 hours them trying to get an ok to send me to labor and delivery....and finally they said we'll just keep you here....I told them all my symptoms and they hooked me up to everything under the sun.  And even did and EKG....everything was perfectly normal the whole time I was there....my BP 127/70 never went higher my pule 99-110 never went higher.....everything looked fine they still wouldn't listen to me about wanting a urine test but the did draw blood and said it all looked good.  They didn't even once check my babies to make sure they were ok...so now I have to wear a heart monitor and stil have no answers.....I don't know what to do I still feel like they are missing something.
title: Update from a night in the ER
